about_the_game:
Live Cycling Manager 2023 is the ultimate cycling manager game.
Select or create the club of your dreams and manage each and every aspect! Become the Sports Manager of a professional team and compete against another 40 teams until you reach the top.
Control all aspects of your club: Training sessions, transfers, staff, race strategies, sponsors, finances..
detailed_description:
Live Cycling Manager 2023 is the ultimate cycling manager game.
Select or create the club of your dreams and manage each and every aspect! Become the Sports Manager of a professional team and compete against another 40 teams until you reach the top.
Control all aspects of your club: Training sessions, transfers, staff, race strategies, sponsors, finances..
legal_notice:
BASIC INFORMATION ON DATA PROTECTION

RESPONSIBLE:
XAGU STUDIOS S.L. (NIF: B75134445)

PURPOSE
• Manage the download, installation, updates and operation of the Live Cycling Manager 2022 application
• Sending own commercial communications and third party advertising.

LEGITIMATION
• Consent of the interested party regarding the sending of commercial communications from third parties and / or transfer of data to third parties for the same purpose.
• Management, development and fulfillment of the contractual or pre-contractual relationship.
• Legitimate interest in certain data processing and provision of services as necessary to carry out the contracted service / product.

RECIPIENTS
• Official organizations when there is a legal obligation.
• There are no planned international transfers.
• Service providers for sending commercial information, web hosting, etc.

RIGHTS
Access, rectify and delete the data, as well as other rights, as explained in the additional information.

ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
You can consult additional and detailed information on Data Protection on our website.
name: Live Cycling Manager 2023

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Live Cycling Manager 2023 is the ultimate cycling manager game. Select or create the club of your dreams and manage each and every aspect! Become the Sports Manager of a professional team and compete against another 40 teams until you reach the top.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Czech, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Greek, Dutch, Japanese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Arabic, Catalan, Basque
